Minangka koki kepala restoran, masakané Payung Za Warudo pancen karya seni kuliner. Para pelanggan kagum karo rasane sing luar biasa, saben gigitan nuduhaké keahlian tanpa tandhing. "Rahasiaé?" ujare Payung Za Warudo. "Sentuhan ahli, jiwa sing alus, lan seni pijet sing sampurna."
plants.info:
<size=36>Nglontar mayit menyang mburi lan nge-freeze nganggo Ultimate-né.

<color=#4A2900>Syarat Panganggon: Mode Kelana | Pilihan Awal bareng Payung Za Warudo</color>
<color=black>Daya Tahan: </color><color=#8B0000>4000</color>
<color=black>Spesial: </color><color=#8B0000>
<color=black>•</color> Subspesies saka Payung Sultan. Gunakna Plinthengan Kubis lan Plinthengan Jagung kanggo ganti-ganti ing antarane loro.
<color=black>•</color> Ora isa maneh ningkatké proyektil sing diledhèk. Gantiné, mayit sing nyedhak bakal diserang lan didorong mundur kaya efek Umbrella Husk.
<color=black>•</color> Gunakna 6000 Koin kanggo ngeluaraké Ultimate, nggawe efek Mentega marang mayit sakupeté lan nglontar mau menyang mburi.</color></color>

plants.name: <color=yellow>Payung Tresna
plants.introduce:
<size=36><align=justified><color=black><color=#3D1400>Pembuat Tekstur: @仨硝基甲苯 & @摆烂的克莱尔</color>
Legenda nyritakaké yen Payung Tresna turu ing impen tanpa wates, mung tangi nalika ana wong nemu warna kesukaane. Ing sak kedipan mripat, dhèwèké sumunar kanthi kaendahan sing ora bisa ditandhingi. Nanging atiné gampang owah kaya cuaca sawisé prahara—warna favorité terus ganti, ora tau tetep suwé.
plants.info:
<size=36>Nglontar lan nge-hipno mayit nganggo Ultimate-né.

<color=#4A2900>Syarat Panganggon: Mode Kelana | Pilihan Awal bareng Payung Sultan</color>
<color=black>Daya Tahan: </color><color=#8B0000>4000</color>
<color=black>Spesial: </color><color=#8B0000>
<color=black>•</color> Subspesies saka Payung Sultan. Gunakna Plinthengan Kubis lan Jamur Hipno kanggo ganti-ganti ing antarane loro.
<color=black>•</color> Ora isa maneh ningkatké proyektil sing diledhèk. Gantiné, mayit sing nyedhak bakal didorong mundur lan nduwèni kemungkinan 5% kena hipno.
<color=black>•</color> Gunakna 1000 * [10 + 4ln(Jumlah mayit + 1)] Koin kanggo ngeluaraké Ultimate, nge-charm kabèh mayit sakupeté.</color></color>

plants.name: <color=yellow>Kacang Kembar Hipno
plants.introduce: <size=36>
plants.info: <size=36>Durung diterapaké.

plants.name: Kembang Srengenge Kipli
plants.introduce: <size=32><color=black>"Satemene, Kembang Srengenge sing ana ing mburiku iku adhiku," Kipli nerangake marang kabeh wong. "Kita wis ora iso dipisahake wiwit lBanyu. Dheweke seneng ngasilake Srengenge, lan aku numpes nir kanggo dheweke." Nanging kabeh wong ngerti sing bener: sedulur Kipli sing ceria iku siscon total. Sawise kabeh, saben Mayit sing nyedhaki adhine kanthi misterius bakal nguap dening sinar srengenge.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Kembang Kacang Srengenge iso murub Peluru Srengenge sing ngasilake Srengenge.

<color=black>Karusakan: </color><color=#8B0000>100/5 Detik</color>
<color=black>Khusus: </color><color=#8B0000>Peluru ngeculake 5 Srengenge nalika nempuh Mayit.</color>
<color=black>Formula Fusi: </color><color=#8B0000>Kipli + Kembang Srengenge</color></size>

plants.name: Kipli Ceri
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>"Sampeyan mikir aku duwe masalah nesu banget? aku? Bah! Sampeyan abang lan panas! Kulawargamu kabeh abang!" Kipli Ceri ngremehake yen digodha babagan warna sirahe. Nanging guyonan kasebut ora suwe. Iku mung kedadeyan sing nyenengake. Sawise mangan ceri khusus, Kipli nemokake awake dadi abang lan panas, lan kaget. , dheweke iso nembak ceri.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Kipli Ceri ngobong ceri sing kuat.

<color=black>Karusakan: </color><color=#8B0000>60/1,5 Detik</color>
<color=black>Formula Fusi: </color><color=#8B0000>Kipli + Ceri Bomb</color></size>

plants.name: Bom Surya
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>"Dadi… wis jelas… awake dhewe iki Pretty Cure, ta?" Adhine Kembang Srengenge loro mau nyoba ngempet rasa senenge. "Donya butuh kita. kanggo nylametake!" Katresnane wong-wong mau banjur padha mbengok bebarengan, " Cahya! Padhangake tanah iki!"</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Bom Surya iso ngasilake Srengenge sawise mateni Mayit.

<color=black>Karusakan: </color><color=#8B0000>1800 (Kremator)</color>
<color=black>Khusus: </color><color=#8B0000>Ngasilake 25 Srengenge kanggo saben Mayit sing tiwas ing bledosan.</color>
<color=black>Formula Fusi: </color><color=#8B0000>Kembang Srengenge + Ceri Bomb</color></size>

plants.name: Ceri Kacang
plants.introduce: <size=34><color=black>"Aku krungu sawetara Mayit nggrundel amarga ora iso mangan ceri. Lha, aku iki!" Kacang Ceri sing ceria nggoyang-goyang godhong ing ndhuwur sirahe, ngegungake rasa ceri sing murni. "Nanging dhisik, sampeyan kudu janji karo aku: yen sampeyan duwe ceri, bareng karo aku. Nyatane, wenehi kabeh sing sampeyan duwe! Aku lBanyu kanggo iki!"</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=34>Ceri Kacang iso nyerep karusakan bledosan lan mulihake kaku.

<color=black>Kateguhan: </color><color=#8B0000>4000</color>
<color=black>Khusus: </color><color=#8B0000>Nyerep karusakan bledosan Ceri kanggo mulihake ketangguhan (Saka Ally: 25, Saka Musuh: 200)</color>
<color=black>Formula Fusi: </color><color=#8B0000>Bom Ceri + Kacang</color></size>

plants.name: Kipli Kacang
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>"Ora... ojo nyeluk aku elek, opo maneh... enteni... aku bakal nyemprot sampeyan." Kacang-Kacangan tansah berjuang karo kang "unik" katon nanging kuwat pracaya sing ana ing njero tanduran iku luwih penting tinimbang carane katon, kanthi andhap asor takon Bowling Kacang senior lan pungkasanipun nguwasani technique rolling Kacang kaya bowling. bal.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Peluru cilik Kipli Kacang sing iso nembus Mayit.

<color=black>Kateguhan: </color><color=#8B0000>4000</color>
<color=black>Karusakan: </color><color=#8B0000>20/1,5 Detik (Piercing) </color>
<color=black>Formula Fusi: </color><color=#8B0000>Kipli + Kacang</color></size>

plants.name: Kipli Bom
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Ketemu Kipli Bom, pembunuh tetuwuhan utama. Dheweke luwih gampang nesu-sapa sing ngira Kipli Ceri sing ramah lan ramah bakal nguntal ceri khusus liyane? Don 'Aja meksa rejeki karo dheweke. Sakura sing macet ing tenggorokan iso dadi tembakan sabanjure - raine wis dadi abang!</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Ceri sing diobong dening Kipli Bom bakal nyebabake karusakan bledosan ing area. Dheweke uga kebal saka bledosan ceri.

<color=black>Karusakan: </color><color=#8B0000>300/3 Detik</color>
<color=black>Formula Fusi: </color><color=#8B0000>Kipli + Ceri Bom + Bom Ceri</color></size>

plants.name: Kacang Srengenge
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Kacang Srengenge tansah nganggep awake dhewe minangka malaekat, ora ngerti yen tanduran liya asring ngomong ing mburine. "Sampeyan ngerti, yen dheweke nambah sawetara garis ireng, dheweke katon persis kaya tawon!"</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Kacang Srengenge ngasilake Srengéngé nalika nglindhungi tanduran sampeyan.

<color=black>Kateguhan: </color><color=#8B0000>4000</color>
<color=black>Output Srengenge: </color><color=#8B0000>25/15 Detik</color>
<color=black>Formula Fusi: </color><color=#8B0000>Kembang Srengenge + Kacang</color></size>

plants.name: Ranjau Kipli
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Kipli Ranjau iso uga ora duwe mripat, nanging dheweke duwe cara khusus kanggo ngrasakake Mayit. nyedhaki… nyedhaki… nyedhaki…" Detak jantung Kipli Ranjau cepet, lan uga kacepetan tembake. bledosan kembang api rasa kentang.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Ranjau Kipli iso nyerang sadurunge digali.

<color=black>Karusakan: </color><color=#8B0000>20/1,5 Detik</color>
<color=black>Khusus: </color><color=#8B0000>Serangan luwih cepet nalika nir nyedhaki njeblug, ngeculake 36 proyektil arah.</color>
<color=black>Formula Fusi: </color><color=#8B0000>Kipli + Ranjau Kentang</color></size>

plants.name: Ceri Kiplipli
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Ceri Kiplipli urip kanthi semboyan "barang-barang sing apik-apik teka pasangan-pasangan." Apa sing nglawan Mayit utawa menehi hadiah, dheweke nindakake kabeh dadi loro. "Nanging teka. on," Kiplipli nggodha, "seri-serimu kuwi durung mateng."</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Ceri Kiplipli iso murub loro Ceri sekaligus.

<color=black>Karusakan: </color><color=#8B0000>60*2/1,5 Detik</color>
<color=black>Formula Fusi: </color><color=#8B0000>Kiplipli + Ceri Bomb</color></size>

plants.name: Ranjau Surya
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>"Mandheg ing lampu abang, alon-alon ing lampu kuning, lan manut aturan lalu lintas!" Ranjau Surya kerep ngelingake Mayit. Nanging kanggo para Mayit, kabeh sing katon mung werna ijo njijiki sadurunge wong clutch godhong ijo lan pouts, pengin kanggo liyane Srengengeshine kabeh!"</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Ranjau Surya ngasilake Srengenge nganti lan sawise jeblugan.

<color=black>Karusakan: </color><color=#8B0000>1800</color>
<color=black>Srengenge Output: </color><color=#8B0000>25/15 Detik</color>
<color=black>Formula Fusi: </color><color=#8B0000>Ranjau Kembang Srengenge + Kentang</color></size>

plants.name: Ranjau Kacang
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Nalika katon cilik lan ringkih, Ranjau Kacang saiki ngadeg dhuwur lan kuwat, ngegungake sepasang mata gedhe lan daging sing mantep. Nanging ing sangisore njaba sing kuwat, dheweke rumangsa rapuh. lan wedi nyusut maneh menyang ukurane sing mbiyen. Mayit padha ngucap, "Yen sampeyan cokotan maneh, sampeyan bakal njeblug!"</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Kacang Ranjau iso njeblug nalika dipangan lan sapisan nalika rusak.

<color=black>Kateguhan: </color><color=#8B0000>4000</color>
<color=black>Karusakan: </color><color=#8B0000>500 / Jeblugan, 1800 / Pati</color>
<color=black>Formula Fusi: </color><color=#8B0000>Kacang Tembok + Ranjau Kentang</color></size>

plants.name: Kipli Penelen
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Penelen tansah iri karo kemampuan Nelen-shooter kanggo nguntal sisa-sisa Mayit, lan dheweke nyoba sinau trik luwih saka sepisan. Nanging dheweke ora ngerti rahasia kasebut. dudu katrampilan khusus — mung cangkeme Nelen-shooter sing rada cacat, nyebabake potongan Mayit bocor nalika ngunyah.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Nelen-shooter iso ngobong bagean sawise digigit.

<color=black>Karusakan: </color><color=#8B0000>Langsung Turu</color>
<color=black>Khusus: </color><color=#8B0000>Spits out rolling parts Mayit after biting that deals 80 damage.</color>
<color=black>Formula Fusi: </color><color=#8B0000>Kipli + Penelen</color></size>

plants.name: Kacang Penelen
plants.introduce: <size=34><color=black>Minangka tanduran enom, Nelen Kacang misuwur pilih-pilih babagan panganan, ora tau nguntal Mayit ing siji cokotan, sing nggawe frustasi wong tuwane. Sawise akeh persuasi, Nelen Kacang pungkasane sinau. kanggo ngonsumsi Mayit kanthi wutuh, kaya sing sadurunge. "Aku ora pilih-pilih! Aku mung pengin niru carane Mayit mangan. Aku kudu nyoba sing anyar, ta? Mesthi ora amarga aku ora duwe gulu!" Nelen Kacang ngandika karo ngunyah Mayit.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=34>Nelen Kacang iso mulihake kekuwatan sawise mangan Mayit.

<color=black>Karusakan: </color><color=#8B0000>Mateni Langsung</color>
<color=black>Ketangguhan: </color><color=#8B0000>4000</color>
<color=black>Formula Fusi: </color><color=#8B0000>Kacang + Penelen</color></size>

plants.name: Mlotrozilla
plants.introduce: <size=32><color=black>Mlotrozilla ngrasakake saben dhaharan, senajan cangkeme cilik. " Cangkeme gedhe ora kesusu lan ora kenek gym; padha ambruk ing baris ngarep,"dheweke moyoki. "Aku mung mangan inti saka daging Mayit lan ngidoni metu liyane," dheweke nyengir, sanajan latar mburi ngisi turahan.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=32>Mlotrozilla iso dadi benteng lan penyerang sing galak.

<color=black>Kateguhan: </color><color=#8B0000>4000</color>
<color=black>Khusus: </color><color=#8B0000>Mangan Mayit mulihake 200 Ketangguhan lan menehi 200 Karusakan nalika ngidoni bagean Mayit muter sing nyebabake 80 Karusakan lan tusukan tanpa wates karo HP <500 lan ora ana waja sing Langsung mati, mulihake 400 Ketangguhan lan muntahake bagean Mayit sing muter.</color>
<color=black>Formula Fusi: </color><color=#8B0000>Kipli + Kacang + Penelen</color></size>

plants.name: Srengenge Penelen
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Kabeh wong kepengin weruh carane Srengenge Penelen ngowahi Mayit sing dimangsa dadi sinar Srengenge, nanging tansah ragu-ragu kanggo nuduhake rahasiane. Ing sawijining dina, Kembang Srengenge nemokake yen isi klorofil dheweke akeh banget. suda, mbukak sing bener: ora bener ngowahi Mayit dadi srengenge.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Srengenge Penelen iso ngasilake Srengenge sawise ngulu Mayit.

<color=black>Karusakan: </color><color=#8B0000>Langsung Turu</color>
<color=black>Khusus: </color><color=#8B0000>Ngasilake 100 Srengenge sawise ngulu Mayit.</color>
<color=black>Formula Fusi: </color><color=#8B0000>Kembang Srengenge + Penelen</color></size>

plants.name: Nelen Ranjau
plants.introduce: <size=32><color=black>Enak lan memikat, Ranjau rasane kaya kentang tumbuk sing iso dipanasake dhewe, entuk ulasan apik saka Mayit. Antarane wong-wong mau, kentang goreng njupuk posisi paling dhuwur ing popularitas. Nalika Mayit kumpul. kanggo gondho tantalizing French goreng, padha ora duwe idea padha uga nyenengi ing Kripik kentang sedhep "Cukup ngenteni lan ndeleng," Nelen Ranjau karo Mulut Penuh, "Nutrisi bakal dadi Ranjau anyar."</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=32>Sawise nguntal Mayit, Nelen Ranjau bakal tuwuh Ranjau Kentang ing ngarep.

<color=black>Karusakan: </color><color=#8B0000>Langsung Turu</color>
<color=black>Khusus: </color><color=#8B0000>Nandur Ranjau Kentang ing ngarepe nalika ngulu Mayit.</color>
<color=black>Formula Fusi: </color><color=#8B0000>Ranjau Kentang + Penelen</color></size>

plants.name: Ceri Penelen
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Wiwit dheweke ngombe Ceri Bomb, Penelen terus-terusan "berdengung." Dheweke dadi ancaman mutlak saben dhahar. Swara mamah berubah dadi njeblug. minangka piring lan mangkok mabur nang endi wae, ninggalake kabeh wong ora gelem mangan karo dheweke Sawise nuduhake tangan, Ceri Penelen pungkasanipun mangan ing yard ... kudu tuku peralatan meja anyar.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Ngasilake bledosan ceri nalika mangan Mayit.

<color=black>Karusakan: </color><color=#8B0000>Langsung Turu + 1800 (Kremator)</color>
<color=black>Khusus: </color><color=#8B0000>Nggawe bledosan Ceri ing kothak 3x3 nalika biting.</color>
<color=black>Formula Fusi: </color><color=#8B0000>Ceri Bomb + Penelen</color></size>

plants.name: Brondong Ceri
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Laras Brondong Ceri tansah abang panas. Dheweke njamin kabeh wong yen wis digawe panas kanggo mesthekake tembak luwih cepet. Kabeh tuku crita-nganti padha kejiret mangan ceri khusus tanpa mbusak. laras.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Formulir pungkasan Kipli Ceri!

<color=black>Karusakan: </color><color=#8B0000>60*4/1,5 Detik</color>
<color=black>Formula Fusi: </color><color=#8B0000>Brondong Kipli + Ceri Bomb</color></size>

plants.name: Kipli Jamur
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>"Aja nganti ukuranku ngapusi sampeyan; sanajan awak cilik iso ngemot akeh energi," Kipli Jamur ngelingake wong-wong sing ngremehake dheweke. " Kita kabeh wiwit minangka  Jamur cilik, nggawe kemajuan sethithik. Kanthi dedikasi kanggo sarapan sing cerah, sampeyan iso dadi kaya aku."</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Kipli Jamur njupuk luwih saka Jamur Cilik.

<color=black>Karusakan: </color><color=#8B0000>20/1,5 Detik</color>
<color=black>Formula Fusi: </color><color=#8B0000>Jamur Cilik + Kipli (In Order)</color></size>

plants.name: Jamur Kipli
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>"Sapa aku iki? Tembakan kaping pindho ngemu jawaban!" ujare ReKiplit Jamur cilik, kanthi bangga ngegungake godhong kembar ing ndhuwur sirahe. Kanthi tingkat tembak tikel kaping pindho lan sorak kaping pindho, makhluk-makhluk sing semangat iki ngrembaka ing kelompok, kanthi semangat nyemburake tenaga geni menyang medan perang. , nuduhake ukuran kasebut ora nemtokake kekuwatane.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>ReKiplit Jamur iso murub loro Kipli cilik sekaligus.

<color=black>Karusakan: </color><color=#8B0000>20*2/1,5 Detik</color>
<color=black>Formula Fusi: </color><color=#8B0000>Jamur Cilik + Kipli * 2</color></size>

plants.name: Kipliwesi
plants.introduce: <size=35><color=black>"Aku mujudake roh leluhurku; Aku ora bakal tiba ing kene!" Embershooter negesake kanthi yakin marang sapa wae sing nyabrang dalane. Nalika diterangake yen helm dheweke meh padha karo sing dicolong saka Mayit Emberethead, dheweke mbantah, "Banjur ayo padha njaluk karsane lan numpak angin lan ombak maneh!"</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=34>Embershooter nduweni kemampuan kanggo mecah waja.

<color=black>Kateguhan: </color><color=#8B0000>2000</color>
<color=black>Karusakan: </color><color=#8B0000>80/1,5 Detik</color>
<color=black>Khusus: </color><color=#8B0000>Ndadekake karusakan gedhe kanggo Iron Mayit, lan ngrusak lawang wesi.</color>
<color=black>Formula Fusi: </color><color=#8B0000>Kipli + Emberet</color></size>

plants.name: Kacang-Kacangan
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Kacang utawa  Jamur? Yagene kuwatir bab label? Kacang Jamur ora bakal ngandhani yen iki sejatine matsutake sing nyamar.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Kacang Jamur iso dadi bek sing kuat sanajan ukurane.

<color=black>Kateguhan: </color><color=#8B0000>2000</color>
<color=black>Formula Fusi: </color><color=#8B0000>Jamur Cilik + Kacang (In Order)</color></size>

plants.name: Jamur Cilik Hipno
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>"Nalika isih bocah, aku percaya yen Mayit ora liya mung monster dongeng," ujare Jamur Cilik Hipno lirih. "Saiki, aja ngerti. bengkong—aku mung mbalekake menyang dongeng sing mesthine kudune."</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Nyusut Mayit lan nggawe perang kanggo sampeyan!

<color=black>Khusus: </color><color=#8B0000>Ndadekake Mayit luwih cilik (ngethok Kesehatan dadi setengah. ) lan perang kanggo sampeyan.</color>
<color=black>Formula Fusi: </color><color=#8B0000>Jamur Cilik + Jamur Hipno (Ing Order)</color></size>

plants.name: Gembul Parfum
plants.introduce: <size=33><color=black>Jamur Gembul sing warna-warni nggawe debut gedhe! Kanthi wangi parfum, iso ngowahi Mayit kanthi cepet. Sawetara ngaku yen iki minangka teknik rahasia sing diwarisake dening kulawarga  Jamur, nalika liyane pracaya iku senjata militèr nglereni-pinggiran Parfum Jamur mung mesem lan ngandika, "Iku kabeh thanks kanggo Jamur Hipno ngewangi kula mbilas tutuk. saben dina."</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=33>Asap semprotan parfum sing iso narik kawigaten Mayit.

<color=black>Karusakan: </color><color=#8B0000>20/1,5 Detik (Piercing) </color>
<color=black>Khusus: </color><color=#8B0000>Peluang kanggo pesona Mayit karo <50% Health Hipnotizes Mayit sing mangan iku.</color>
<color=black>Formula Fusi: </color><color=#8B0000>Jamur Gembul + Jamur Hipno</color></size>

plants.name: Jamur Hipno Kicep
plants.introduce: <size=33><color=black>Jamur Kicep mesthi wedi karo Mayit. Kanggo ngurangi rasa wedine, Jamur Hipno saben dina nyritakake crita sadurunge turu: "Satemene, ana sing apik. wong ing antarane Mayit." Suwe-suwe, Jamur Kicep pungkasane dicuci otak. Saiki dheweke iso nggunakake spora kanggo ngumbah otak Mayit. Mesthi wae dheweke isih wedi banget.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=33>Jamur Hipno Kicep murub spora ing 7 werna.

<color=black>Karusakan: </color><color=#8B0000>20/1,5 Detik</color>
<color=black>Khusus: </color><color=#8B0000>Secara acak murub 1 saka 7 jinis spora Nalika Mayit kena kabeh 7 jinis saka spora, iku bakal pesona saben kenek dening jinis spora, kemungkinan pesona Parfum Jamur bakal nambah.</color>
<color=black>Formula Fusi: </color><color=#8B0000>Jamur Hipno + Jamur Kicep</color></size>

plants.name: Jamur Gagah
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>"Wani ngebaki aku, ora ana rasa wedi~ Apa iku musim semi, musim gugur, mangsa, utawa panas~" Jamur Gagah ora nyusut maneh ngadhepi Mayit. "Aku biyen gumeter, nanging Senior Jamur Gembul kandha, 'Yen Mayit nyedhaki, semprotan spora sampeyan. Ndhelikake ora bakal ngrampungake apa-apa.'"</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Jamur Gagah wis siyap nyerang Mayit, cedhak utawa adoh!

<color=black>Karusakan: </color><color=#8B0000>20*2/ 1,5 Detik</color>
<color=black>Khusus: </color><color=#8B0000>Nalika nir nyedhaki 3 ubin, dheweke bakal nyemprotake asap sing tusukan. tinimbang.</color>
<color=black>Formula Fusi: </color><color=#8B0000>Jamur Gembul + Jamur Kicep</color></size>

plants.name: Jamur Lope-Lope
plants.introduce: <size=33><color=black>Jamur Lope-Lope ngomong karo eseman alus, "Saben spora nggawa katresnanku, lan nalika mekar, kaya angin musim semi sing ngelus-elus hawa." Dheweke malah mbengkongake sirahe menyang ati kanggo ngungkapake rasane, mripate sumorot kanthi ikhlas, ngarep-arep mungkin, mung, Mayit bakal ngerti katresnane.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=32>Lope-Lope Jamur iso ngobong spora Pesona sing mbledhos.

<color=black>Karusakan: </color><color=#8B0000>80 / 1,5 Detik</color>
<color=black>Khusus: </color><color=#8B0000>40 karusakan cipratan ing kothak 1x1.5 Nduweni kasempatan kanggo Pesona nir karo < 50% HP.</color>
<color=black>Formula Fusi: </color><color=#8B0000>Jamur Gembul + Jamur Kicep + Jamur Hipno</color></size>

plants.name: Kacang Dhuwur
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>"Sing dhuwur kowe, kowe dadi luwih kuwasa." Si jangkung percaya karo iki, mula dheweke tetep ana ing garis ngarep. tetanduran bakal nggusah wong kanggo njupuk gampang, nanging mung mesem lan ngandika, "Ora apa, aku dhuwur. Anggere sampeyan perang cepet, Mayit ora bakal duwe wektu kanggo mangan kabeh aku."</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Dhuwur Kacang minangka tanduran tembok tugas abot sing ora iso dilebokake utawa mlumpat.

<color=black>Kateguhan: </color><color=#8B0000>8000</color></size>

plants.name: Kacang Delimi
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Kacang Delimi katon galak, nyebabake sawetara tanduran cilik sing ora ngerti sing bener dadi wedi karo penampilane. Nanging, tanduran sing ngerti Kacang Delimi ngerti yen Ing ngisor njaba sing serius ana tekad sing kuat kanggo nglindhungi kanca-kancane sing dicolong mesthi nambah kapercayan.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Kacang Delimi iso nahan karusakan sing akeh banget.

<color=black>Kateguhan: </color><color=#8B0000>16000</color>
<color=black>Khusus: </color><color=#8B0000>Iso dipakani obyek logam kanggo mulihake 500 HP.</color>
<color=black>Formula Fusi: </color><color=#8B0000>Dhuwur Kacang + Delimi Helm</color></size>

plants.name: Ember Kacang
plants.introduce: <size=34><color=black>Tetuwuhan nggadhahi raos konflik babagan Ember Kacang. Minangka prajurit teladan, dheweke nindakake prentah kanthi presisi sing ora iso diowahi, nanging sikape sing adhem ora dikarepake. pojok-pojok cangkeme nuduhake masa lalu sing isih sepi, Nanging, Ember Kacang wrestles karo kuwatir sing ora iso diucapake: "Kepiye. nyegah karat ing taman sing lembab?"</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=34>Ngalangi majune Mayit nganggo tembok wesi.

<color=black>Kateguhan: </color><color=#8B0000>8000</color>
<color=black>Khusus: </color><color=#8B0000>Iso dipakani obyek logam kanggo mulihake 500 HP Iki uga ditrapake kanggo MeDhuwuric liyane Tanduran.</color>
<color=black>Formula Fusi: </color><color=#8B0000>Kacang + Emberet</color></size>

plants.name: Kiplipli
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Boten kados sadherekipun ingkang sumringah lan sumringah, Kiplipli nggadhahi gesang tanpa beban—nganti wektune perang. Dheweke meneng-menengan nguwasani seni tembak ganda nanging didhelikake saka Kipli. "Aku mung pengin dheweke urip seneng, tanpa kudu sinau katrampilan perang iki."</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Kiplipli ngetokake rong Kipli bebarengan.

<color=black>Karusakan: </color><color=#8B0000>20*2/1,5 Detik</color>
<color=black>Formula Fusi: </color><color=#8B0000>Kipli + Kipli</color></size>

plants.name: Jamur Cilik Srengenge
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Jamur Cikik Srengenge sengit marang srengenge. Dheweke sengit banget yen nalika tuwuh ing sistem dheweke, dheweke bakal ngudhunake srengenge kanthi cepet. Dheweke ora bakal kanggo dheweke, srengenge iku kasar.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Srengenge Jamur menehi srengéngé cilik ing wiwitan lan srengéngé normal mengko.

<color=black>Srengenge Output: </color><color=#8B0000>15 (25) / 25 Detik
<color=black>Wektu Wutah: </color><color=#8B0000>120 Detik</color>
<color=black>Formula Fusi: </color><color=#8B0000>Jamur Cilik + Kembang Srengenge</color></size>

plants.name: Brondong Kipli
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Brondong Kipli, kakang kakung saka kulawarga Kipli, ngadeg dhuwur karo laras bedhil, dhasar kanggo safety saben wong. Punggunge kaya monumen ing medan perang, Dikagumi dening kabeh, nanging dheweke mesem kanthi sopan, ngerti yen urip saben dinane diatur dening adhine, Kipli, "Aku ora iso urip tanpa dheweke," ujare tenang.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Brondong Kipli ngetokake papat Kipli bebarengan.

<color=black>Karusakan: </color><color=#8B0000>20*4/1,5 Detik</color>
<color=black>Formula Fusi: </color><color=#8B0000>Kembar Kipli + Kipli</color></size>

plants.name: Kembang Srengenge Kembar
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Kembang Srengenge Kembar dikenal minangka sadulur, tansah makarya ing mburi layar tinimbang ing garis ngarep medan perang. Perane kanggo ndhukung kabeh wong saka mburi, nanging ora salah. —Sampeyan kudu nglindhungi wong-wong mau yen dirusak, akeh tanduran sing bakal nangis.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Kembang Srengenge Kembar menehi srengenge tikel kaping pindho tinimbang kembang srengenge normal.

<color=black>Output Srengenge: </color><color=#8B0000>25*2/20 Detik </color>
<color=black>Formula Fusi: </color><color=#8B0000>Kembang Srengenge + Kembang Srengenge</color></size>

plants.name: Kipli Es
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Kipli Es sing berdarah dingin arang banget nuduhake emosine marang tetuwuhan liyane. Ana sing kandha yen atine luwih adhem tinimbang Kipli beku sing diobong. Kipli Es ora gelem. metu saka kono, nanging saben mbukak cangkeme, peluru sing diluncurake nyebabake atmosfer ing sakubenge nganti suhu beku.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Snow Kiplis nembak Kipli beku sing ngrusak lan alon mungsuh.

<color=black>Karusakan: </color><color=#8B0000>20/1,5 Detik</color>
<color=#0077b6>Sistem Beku: </color><color=#8B0000>Saben peluru bakal nambah 10 Beku Poin.</color>
<color=black>Formula Fusi: </color><color=#8B0000>Kipli + Jamur Es</color></size>

plants.name: Kiplipli Jamur Es
plants.introduce: <size=33><color=black>Kiplipli Jamur Es ora iso nguwasani teknologi pendinginan. Sajrone lelungan hiPrabu, dheweke lali selimut lan nginep sewengi beku ing ndhuwur gunung, mbentuk es. Ing sirahe, Snow Kipli, kepincut karo penampilane sing es, menehi sawetara es kanggo nglengkapi tampilan anyar.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=33>Kiplipli Jamur Es ngobong es sing nyepetake mungsuh.

<color=black>Karusakan: </color><color=#8B0000>20/1,5 Detik</color>
<color=#0077b6>Sistem Beku: </color><color=#8B0000>Nambah 5 Poin Beku kanggo saben ketukan es. Pierce kaping 3. Saben Kiplipli Es bakal menehi karusakan 4 kaping luwih kanggo Mayit beku.</color>
<color=black>Formula Fusi: </color><color=#8B0000>Jamur Cilik + Snow Kipli (In Order) )</color></size>

plants.name: Jamur Es Cilik
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>"Ukurane luwih cilik, kabisan gedhe padha!" Wajah poker khas Jamur Es Cilik ora tau retak nalika dheweke ngirim lelucon, lan iso uga sebabe Mayit beku. ing titik.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Jamur Es Cilik iso membekukan sementara Mayit sing kena kontak.

<color=black>Khusus: </color><color=#8B0000>Membekukan Mayit sing dipangan. ing panggonan.</color>
<color=black>Formula Fusi: </color><color=#8B0000>Jamur Cilik + Jamur Es (Ing Order)</color></size>

plants.name: Jamur Gembul Es
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Jamur Gembul Es menonjol antarane Jamur Gembul. Sinau ing luar negeri ing ara-ara samun Alaskan sing beku nggawe dheweke luwih adhem-secara harfiah. Sanajan dheweke mung sinau desain rambut kanggo sawetara. taun, dheweke bangga banget.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Asap Jamur Gembul Es iso ngliwati lan beku Mayit.

<color=black>Karusakan: </color><color=#8B0000>20/1,5 Detik (Tusukan) </color>
<color=#0077b6>Sistem Beku: </color><color=#8B0000>Bakal nambah 5 Beku Points sawise saben serangan.</color>
<color=black>Formula Fusi: </color><color=#8B0000>Jamur Gembul + Jamur Es</color></size>

plants.name: Jamur Kicep Es
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Jamur Kicep Es percaya yen dheweke beda karo Jamur sing medeni liyane. Ora kaya dheweke, dheweke ora nate wedi lan melu kabeh kegiatan tanpa ragu-ragu. Nanging, iku mung amarga nalika dheweke wedi, udhara ing sakubenge mudhun ing suhu, nggawe kabeh wong wedi kaget.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Jamur Kicep Es murub spora beku.

<color=black>Karusakan: </color><color=#8B0000>20/1,5 Detik</color>
<color=#0077b6>Sistem Beku: </color><color=#8B0000>10 Poin Beku saben nyerang.</color>
<color=black>Khusus: </color><color=#8B0000>Bekukan Mayit sing cedhak nalika wis cedhak.</color>
<color=black>Formula Fusi: </color><color=#8B0000>Jamur Kicep + Jamur Es</color></size>

plants.name: Kacang Beku
plants.introduce: <size=34><color=black>Kacang Beku ngunggahake Eri es dhuwur, siap kanggo ngadhepi Mayit. Liyane ngomong babagan carane katon "dingin" lan "meneng". Nanging, ekspresine tetep ora owah, teguh ing pertahanan marang undead sing bener raine wis beku ing panggonane.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=34>Kacang Beku minangka tanduran penghalang sing abot. Padha nyepetake Mayit sing nyakot.

<color=black>Kateguhan: </color><color=#8B0000>8000</color>
<color=#0077b6>Sistem Beku: </color><color=#8B0000>Mayit sing nggigit bakal kalem lan akumulasi 10 Beku Points.</color>
<color=black>Khusus: </color><color=#8B0000>Yen kena pengaruh Jamur Es, nambani 1000 Ketangguhan.</color>
<color=black>Formula Fusi: </color><color=#8B0000>Jamur Es + Dhuwur Kacang</color></size>

plants.name: Jamur Ambyar
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>"Aku bakal beku donya, lan kasepen bakal mrentah. Kadhemen sing ekstrem bakal ngganggu sistem suhu awak, mula ora bakal lara banget," ujare Jamur Ambyar. Dheweke arang katon ing perang, nanging nalika kedadeyan kasebut, ana badai salju sing ngetutake dheweke. Kanthi kilat cahya putih. , malah wektu katon beku.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Jamur Ambyar iso numpes Mayit ing kabeh layar lan wektu beku.

<color=black>Karusakan: </color><color=#8B0000>1800 (Kremator)</color>
<color=black>Khusus: </color><color=#8B0000>Membekukan level - ora ana Mayit anyar sing bakal katon ing 10 detik.</color>
<color=black>Formula Fusi: </color><color=#8B0000>Jamur Es + Nuklir Jamur</color></size>

plants.name: Jamur Hipno Beku
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Kaendahan Bekuy? Kembang sing ora kena dEskel? Jamur Hipno Beku ora peduli. Dheweke kanthi tenang ngurus hiasan Bekuy ing sirahe, tansah siap nyerahake Beku dheweke. -tutup kepala Kacang kanggo Mayit kapan wae "Dheweke bakal ngurmati getaran hawa dingin," ujare kanthi keren.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Yen Mayit mangan Jamur Hipno Beku, bakal dadi Mayit Kacang Beku sing bakal perang kanggo sampeyan.

<color=black>Khusus: </color><color=#8B0000>Sawise kontak ngowahi Mayit dadi Mayit Kacang Beku sing bakal nglawan sampeyan uga bakal beku lapangan lengkap.</color>
<color=black>Formula Fusi: </color><color=#8B0000>Jamur Hipno + Jamur Es</color></size>

plants.name: Jamur Kicep Ireng
plants.introduce: <size=33><color=black>Nalika sawetara tanduran kanthi naluri ngubur endhas nalika gugup, Jamur Kicep Ireng ngrembaka amarga kasenengan. Adrenalin dheweke mundhak, nyebabake spora mundhak kanthi cepet. Iku wicaksana kanggo nyegah. memprovokasi maneh, utawa dheweke iso njeblug saka kabeh energi sing disimpen.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=33>Kacepetan serangan Jamur Kicep Ireng mundhak nalika nyerang.

<color=black>Karusakan: </color><color=#8B0000>20 / 1,5 Detik (0,5 Puncak)</color>
<color=black>Khusus: </color><color=#8B0000>Saben serangan bakal nyepetake Jarak Wektu serangan 0,1 detik, maksimal 0,5 detik Reset nalika nir cedhak bakal njeblug nalika nir cedhak nalika kacepetan serangan puncak tekan.</color>
<color=black>Formula Fusi: </color><color=#8B0000>Jamur Kicep. + Nuklir Jamur</color></size>

plants.name: Jamur Nuklir Tekan
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Jamur Nuklir Tekan, workaholic misanthropic, ora tahan ndeleng Mayit-kakehan gangguan. Dheweke duwe tumpukan cilik peluru, nanging padha luwih saka cukup mateni. Yen sampeyan pengin wong-wong mau mati, mung ditembak dhewe." Nanging, efisiensi sing cetha tetep kabeh wong katon munggah marang dheweke.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Jamur Nuklir Tekan iso numpes akeh Mayit ing ngarepe.

<color=black>Karusakan: </color><color=#8B0000>1800/60 Detik</color>
<color=black>Khusus: </color><color=#8B0000>Klik kanthi manual kanggo nyerang kabeh Mayit ing baris.</color>
<color=black>Formula Fusi: </color><color=#8B0000>Jamur Gembul + Nuklir Jamur</color></size>

plants.name: Jamur Nuklir Cilik
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Jamur Nuklir Cilik iso uga cilik, nanging emosine mbledhos. Ora setuju karo dheweke, lan dheweke iso njeblug-ora perlu kontak mata. Paling apik kanggo ngujo dheweke saka adoh—aja nyedhak banget, utawa iso dadi kacau.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Jamur Nuklir Cilik bakal njeblug nalika kena Mayit.

<color=black>Karusakan: </color><color=#8B0000>1800 (Kremator) </color>
<color=black>Khusus: </color><color=#8B0000>Bakal njeblug nalika Mayit entuk nutup.</color>
<color=black>Formula Fusi: </color><color=#8B0000>Jamur Cilik + Nuklir Jamur (In Order)</color></size>

plants.name: Jamur Santet
plants.introduce: <size=34><color=black>Tanduran tansah mikir kenapa Mayit ora iso dipateni kanthi apik. Bubar, Jamur Santet mbukak misteri: "Aku ora nindakake akeh," ngandika andhap asor. "Aku mung kindly mbantu nir ngaktifake serep sumber daya didhelikake. Apa Mayit abang katon ora mbebayani? Nanging aku wis ngelingake dheweke."</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=34>Mayit sing mangan Curse Jamur bakal dihipnotis, lan njeblug sawise mati.

<color=black>Khusus: </color><color=#8B0000>Mayit sing mangan. Kutukan Jamur bakal terpesona kanggo perang kanggo sampeyan Mayit sing dikutuk bakal njeblug nalika mati, menehi karusakan gedhe.</color>
<color=black>Fusi. Formula: </color><color=#8B0000>Jamur Hipno + Nuklir Jamur</color></size>

plants.name: Gojo
plants.introduce: <size=32><color=black>Beku wis ngubengi awak, nyingkirake kaluputan nalika isih enom. Mripate, luwih adhem lan luwih mati tinimbang laras bedhil, saiki mung ngremehake mungsuh. dadi reaper, pungkasan baris Sapa wae sing kejiret ing pandelengan Bekued bakal luwih apik kanggo ninggalake siji jajanan disiapake ing ngarep.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=32>Gojo iso ngobong es sing mbledhos.

<color=black>Karusakan: </color><color=#8B0000>20*4/3 Detik</color>
<color=#0077b6>Sistem Beku: </color><color=#8B0000>Tambahake 10 Beku Points menyang Mayit saben transaksi 4 kaping karusakan kanggo nir beku.</color>
<color=black>Khusus: </color><color=#8B0000>Nusuk 3 mungsuh Splashes 10 karusakan ing jangkoan kontak mungsuh.
<color=black>Formula Fusi: </color><color=#8B0000>Jamur Gembul + Jamur Es + Nuklir Jamur</color></size>

plants.name: Jipang Pambabar
plants.introduce: <size=35><color=black>"Dheweke duwe endhas telu, lan dhasare dudu godhong! Dheweke katon ora kaya Kipli biasa!" Akeh tanduran sing wedi ndeleng penampilan sing aneh saka Pambabar Jipang. Nanging, Pambabar Jipang tetep ora kuwatir. Dheweke urip kanthi semangat, nglawan Mayit, maca kanthi rakus, main catur, lan menang saben. lomba lompat blumbang.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=32>Jipang Pambabar iso murub Jipang mumbul cilik.

<color=black>Karusakan: </color><color=#8B0000>40*3/3 Detik</color>
<color=black>Khusus: </color><color=#8B0000>Saben Jipang Cilik ngenani lemah, bakal nyebabake karusakan 40 poin. menyang Mayit sing cedhak.</color>
<color=black>Formula Fusi: </color><color=#8B0000>Jipang + Kipli Telu</color></size>

plants.name: Eri Kacang
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Eri Kacang mesthi meri, mesthi melotot. "Aku kudu nggawe wong-wong ngerti nek aku dudu cemilan," ujare. Nanging Mayit malah ngguyu—soale kapan Kacang tau medeni? Terus digigit. Terus ngerti. Sakit tenan.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Iso nembus mobil es sing nyelonong!!

<color=black>Ketahanan: </color><color=#8B0000>4000</color>
<color=black>Khusus: </color><color=#8B0000>
<color=black>•</color> Iso bocorno ban Mayit sing nyerang, tapi ngorbanake 500 ketahanan. Nanging yen diinjek Buto Ijo, tetep gepeng.
<color=black>•</color> Balekno 1/2 damage gigitan menyang Mayit. Biar ngerti rasa.</color>

plants.name: Lumut Pedes
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>"Karep iku kaya geni," lan Pedes Lumut ngerti banget karo paribasan iki. Ora ana banyu sing iso mateni genine! Alas, Mayit sing cedhak. mung iso ngrasakake panase "panggangan". Delengen, dheweke wis dadi awu ing geni sing ora kendhat iki!</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Pedes Lumut bakal ngobong kabeh baris Mayit nalika kontak.

<color=black>Karusakan: </color><color=#8B0000>Langsung Turu + 1800 (Kremator) </color>
<color=black>Formula Fusi: </color><color=#8B0000>Lumut + Lombok (In Order)</color></size>

plants.name: Lumut Dhuwur
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Dhuwur Lumut minangka filsuf sejati ing antarane tetuwuhan. Asring mikirake pitakonan-pitakonan sing jero kaya, "Endi asale suket, lan menyang ngendi?" Nanging, ora nggatekake karesikan pribadi lan rambut sing ora rapi nggawe tanduran liya isin, luwih seneng njaga jarak.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Dhuwur Lumut iso nyeret telung nir menyang banyu.

<color=black>Karusakan: </color><color=#8B0000>Langsung Turu*3</color>
<color=black>Formula Fusi: </color><color=#8B0000>Jipang + Lumut</color></size>

plants.name: Pambabar Lumut
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Pambabar Lumut njedhul ing srengenge, mripate ndlajahi cakrawala. "Akeh tanduran sing wedi karo aku," dheweke ngguyu. "Nanging padha ngerti yen dheweke kudu nganggo kacamata hitam telung pasang kanggo perlindungan kaya aku!"</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Iso ngobong Lumut sing iso ngendheg Mayit.

<color=black>Karusakan: </color><color=#8B0000>20*3/1.5 Lambat + Iso ditumpuk karo beku </color>
<color=black>Debuff Lumut: </color><color=#8B0000>Saben Lumut bakal nyebabake karusakan persentase tambahan adhedhasar Nilai Tangle Mayit. Mayit bakal dipateni nalika Nilai Tangle kebak.</color>
<color=black>Formula Fusi: </color><color=#8B0000>Kipli Telu + Lumut</color></size>

plants.name: Oncor Jahanam
plants.introduce: <size=32><color=black>"Ana panas ing kene!" Oncor Jahanam nggresula. Merga yakin yen cuaca sing nggegirisi sing disalahake kanggo kulite, dheweke nyathet carane geni ing sirahe uga malih. abang sregep Mungkin iku wektu sampurna kanggo miwiti ngulandara panas disebut "Sledding Tour."</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=32>Oncor Jahanam iso nambah karusakan sing luwih kuat kanggo proyektil!

<color=black>Khusus: </color><color=#8B0000>Ningkatake karusakan gumantung saka jinis proyektil. . Mbledhos nalika mati.
Kipli: 80 |. 60
Ngasilake 40 karusakan-liwat-wektu kanggo cipratan nir saben 3 detik.</color>
<color=black>Formula Fusi: </color><color=#8B0000>Kayu Oncor + Lombok + Lombok</color></size>

plants.name: Oncor Neraka
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Temperatur dhuwur lan rasa Pedes mesthi pas. </color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Proyektil sing diobong dening Oncor Neraka wis nambah daya banget.

<color=black>Khusus: </color><color=#8B0000>Ngapikake karusakan gumantung saka jinis proyektil. Mbukak jalur nalika mati.
Kipli: 60, Ceri: 120, Embers: 320, Srengenge: 400, Kacang Tiga: 45</color>
<color=black>Formula Fusi: </color><color=#8B0000>Lombok + Kayu Oncor</color></size>

plants.name: Jipang Pedes
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>"Aku ora sabar kaya kakangku," ujare Jipang Pedes kanthi tenang. "Dheweke cepet-cepet ngrampungake kabeh, nanging aku ngerti manawa sukses sejatine bakal teka. saka sabar lan ngati-ati. Kadhangkala, luwih becik ngenteni geni lan genine dadi luwih."</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Jipang Pedes iso ngobong kabeh baris Mayit.

<color=black>Karusakan: </color><color=#8B0000>1800 (Single Tile) + 1800 (Lane) + Kremator)</color>
<color=black>Formula Fusi: </color><color=#8B0000>Jipang + Lombok</color></size>

plants.name: Oncor telu
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>"Kenging punapa Oncor telu sugih sanget?" tetuwuhan asring dipikir-pikir. "Oh, ora masalah," dheweke ngangkat bahu. Oncor Telu banjur ngasilake Kipli telu saka rambute lan nambah, "Aku biyen kerja dadi tukang sulap ing sirkus."</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Iso ngowahi Kipli siji dadi telung Kipli sing murub.

<color=black>Khusus: </color><color=#8B0000>Kiplipli Pisah sing liwat dadi 3 geni cilik. Kipli sing nyebabake 30 karusakan cipratan.</color>
<color=black>Formula Fusi: </color><color=#8B0000>Kipli Telu + Kayu Oncor</color></size>

plants.name: Oncor Lumut
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>"Api berjuang tetep ana ing sangisore banyu, tegese aku ora iso nggunakake geniku kanggo madhangi dalan," Oncor Lumut ngakoni. "Nanging sapisan ing ndhuwur lumahing, geniku iso sumunar maneh."</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Ngobong tembakan Lumut utawa nyeret Mayit menyang banyu.

<color=black>Khusus: </color><color=#8B0000>Ngobong Kipli lan tembakan Lumut. Tembakan Lumut sing murub iso nambah 1 Nilai Tangle kanggo kabeh nir ing sawetara cipratan Saben wektu 100 dijupuk surem, a  Lumut nandur ing ngarep.</color>
<color=black>Formula Fusi: </color><color=#8B0000>Lumut + Kayu Oncor</color></size>

plants.name: Jipang Gaib
plants.introduce: <size=30><color=black>Si Jipang Geni mlumpat metu saka panggonane siji-siji. "Panas pol ing kene, awakku meh gosong!" jarene Jipang Geni Gaib bareng-bareng.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=30>Dheweke mung Jipang Gaib biasa.

<color=black>Karusakan: </color><color=#8B0000>1800</color></size>

plants.name: Kipli Telu Gosong
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>"Yagene Lombok tansah entuk kabeh pujian?" Kipli Telu Gosong nguwuh, asep metu saka cangkeme. "Yen dheweke mung ngerti yen gabung karo Lombok ngobong awakmu. Kipli." Dheweke noleh menyang Kayu Oncor kanthi tampilan serius. "Percaya karo aku, sampeyan ora pengin mangan Kipli gosong!"</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Kipli Telu Gosong sing ora iso nggabung amarga wis gosong.

<color=black>Karusakan: </color><color=#8B0000>20*3/1.5 Detik</color>
<color=black>Khusus: </color><color=#8B0000>Ngasilake garis geni sing nyebabake karusakan 1800 (Kremator) ing telung jalur nalika ditandur utawa digabung.</color>
<color=black>Formula Fusi: </color><color=#8B0000>Kipli Telu + Lombok</color></size>

plants.name: Kayu Oncor Jipang
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>"Panas banget! Panas banget!" Jipang bengok-bengok, kepepet ing geni Kayu Oncor. "Sapa sing nyelehake aku ing kene? Aku kudu Jipanging Mayit, ora dadi punchline ing pesta barbekyu!" Panas banget, lan nalika tekan titik break, dheweke murub, njeblug metu saka Oncor kanggo melu perang nglawan Mayit.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Ngasilake Jipang ing ngarep kanggo saben 60 Kipli sing ngliwati.

<color=black>Khusus: </color><color=#8B0000>Saben 60 Kipli lit, Waluh bakal ditandur ing ngarep.</color>
<color=black>Formula Fusi: </color><color=#8B0000>Jipang + Kayu Oncor</color></size>

plants.name: Eri Watu
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Eri Watu lagi wae bali saka lelungan menyang Eropa. Dheweke seneng banget, ketemu wong sing apik tenan, nggedhekake wawasane. Dheweke ora ngerti yen dheweke nggawe museum sing gedhe banget, utawa nglebokake lukisan sing akeh banget, sing dadi kejutan gedhe kanggo dheweke.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Eri Watu nyembulake ban akeh lan ngrusak Mayit sing menginjak.

<color=black>Kateguhan: </color><color=#8B0000>450</color>
<color=black>Khusus: </color><color=#8B0000>Iso nyusup ban, nanging nyuda 50 Ketangguhan.</color></size>

plants.name: Oncor Eri
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>"Aku Oncor Duri, koki barbekyu sing semangat para Mayit! Ignite sing sethitik Kacang, lan aku bakal uncalan wong-wong mau pesta barbecue iso lali. Tenang, aku profesional—aku jamin bakal renyah nang njaba lan empuk nang njero!"</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Oncor Eri iso ngobong Kipli cilik lan kendharaan tusuk.

<color=black>Khusus: </color><color=#8B0000>Ngobong Kipli cilik kanggo tambah, lan cipratan, karusakan. . Saben 100 Kipli cilik diuripake, ana Oncor Eri ing ngarep.</color>
<color=black>Formula Fusi: </color><color=#8B0000>Eri + Kayu Oncor</color></size>

plants.name: Eri Neraka
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>"Panaliten mbuktekake manawa Pedes sejatine minangka jinis rasa lara," ujare Eri Neraka, nggegirisi eri abang ing sirahe. "Aku arep nglilani Mayit sing ora percaya. ngalami kaSrengengeyatan iki dhewe."</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Eri Neraka nyembulake ban lan ngobong nir sing ngidak.

<color=black>Karusakan: </color><color=#8B0000>20, Nimbulake Debuff Kebakar</color>
<color=#720026>Kebakar Debuff: </color><color=#8B0000>Rusak dijupuk mundhak 50%; Mayit karo debuff iki njeblug ing pati, nyebar luwih akeh.</color>
<color=black>Formula Fusi: </color><color=#8B0000>Lombok + Duri</color></size>

plants.name: Eri Jipang
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>"Hah? Ya." Ungkapan iki kalebu Eri Jipang, sing arang ngomong lan asring nggawe wong liya ora yakin. Sawise nedha bengi, topik eri tansah dadi favorit ing antarane tanduran. Dikandhakake yen ing wayah sore biasa, nalika Jipang nyiapake kanggo ngremukake sing cedhak. Mayit, dheweke ora ndeleng eri sing ana ing ngisor sikile.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Mayit bakal dibatalake saben-saben nyerang.

<color=black>Karusakan: </color><color=#8B0000>20/1,5 Detik</color>
<color=black>Khusus: </color><color=#8B0000>Saben serangan bakal ngalahake Mayit lan murub 1 Cilik-Jipang.</color>
<color=black>Formula Fusi: </color><color=#8B0000>Jipang + Duri</color></size>

plants.name: Pambabar Eri
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>"Ora liya ketombe sing dakbuwang," ujare Eri santai. Pambabar Eri ngangkat alis, ora yakin. " Omongan cemburu, yen sampeyan takon. kula," wangsulane. "Sampeyan ora iso ngapusi aku kanthi alasan kuwi."</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Ngobong 3 suket sing nyebabake karusakan kendaraan sing luwih gedhe.

<color=black>Karusakan: </color><color=#8B0000>5*3/1,5 Detik (Tusukan) </color>
<color=black>Khusus: </color><color=#8B0000>Suket menehi 30% karusakan maks. kendaraan.</color>
<color=black>Formula Fusi: </color><color=#8B0000>Kipli Telu + Duri</color></size>

plants.name: Jamur Kipli Brondong
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>"We are budhal menyang tentara!"  Jamur cilik telu bengok-bengok kanthi bungah. Senajan dhuwure ora nyukupi syarat lan nemokake helm cilik. perjuangan, tantangan iki ora iso nahan Jamur Kipli Brondong minangka siji, padha nyetel pandelengan kanggo dadi trio ndhuwur ing tentara.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Iso ditumpuk kaping telu kanggo njupuk 12 Kipli cilik bebarengan!

<color=black>Karusakan: </color><color=#8B0000>20*4/1.5 Detik </color>
<color=black>Formula Fusi: </color><color=#8B0000>Jamur Cilik + Kipli * 4</color></size>

plants.name: Nogo Segoro
plants.introduce: <size=34><color=black>Nogo Segoro nduweni ati sing kontemplatif. Yen sampeyan menehi segelas root beer, disiapake kanggo ceramah babagan karya Nietzsche utawa Kant. Sanajan dheweke duwe pikiran sing jero, kadhangkala dheweke kangen obrolan ringan.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=34>Ngobongi Lumut sing mumbul nalika kontak lan nyepetake Mayit banyu.

<color=black>Karusakan: </color><color=#8B0000>40*3/3 Detik</color>
<color=black>d Debuff: </color><color=#8B0000>Lumut mumbul nalika kontak, menehi 40 Karusakan kanggo nir cedhak nalika padha ndharat. NgaGembule musuh banyu.

plants.name: Kucing
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>"Woof!" jare Kucing. "Woof woof woof! Apa iki bingung sampeyan? Apa sampeyan ngarepake aku ngomong 'Meow' kaya kucing amarga tembung 'kucing' ing jenengku lan aku uga katon kaya kucing? Ora kaya ngono. Aku ora gelem dEskel."</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Kucing iso nyerang sembarang jalur lan nembak Mayit balon.

<color=black>Karusakan: </color><color=#8B0000>20*2/1.5 Detik</color></size>

plants.name: Kucing Beku
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>"Aku ora mung kucing... Aku... Aku kucing super biru!" ujare Kucing Beku. "Do sampeyan duwe catnip kadhemen ...?" Tresna kanggo catnip sumorot, lan dheweke duwe daya tarik sing ora iso dipungkiri karo kabeh sing keren.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Kucing Beku iso nyerang Mayit apa wae ing jalur lan alon-alon.

<color=black>Karusakan: </color><color=#8B0000>20*2/1.5 Detik (Alon) </color>
<color=#0077b6>Sistem Beku: </color><color=#8B0000>Saben hit ing Mayit nambah 5 Beku Points uga fokus serangan marang Mayit sing kena pengaruh.</color>
<color=black>Formula Fusi: </color><color=#8B0000>Jamur Es + Kucing</color></size>

plants.name: Kucing Kobong
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>"Nalika aku isih enom, aku mikir yen aku bakal dadi Kucing biasa," ujare Kucing Kobong, ngempet buntute kanthi bangga. " Ternyata, aku Aku geni sing nggumunake!" Kucing Beku ngempet saka pojok, ngomel, "Pamer."</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Kucing Kobong iso nyerang Mayit ing sembarang jalur lan nyebabake karusakan sing dhuwur.

<color=black>Karusakan: </color><color=#8B0000>40*2/1.5 Detik </color>
<color=#720026>Kebakar Debuff: </color><color=#8B0000>Nganti kaping telu karusakan kanggo Kebakar Mayit.</color>
<color=black>Formula Fusi: </color><color=#8B0000>Lombok + Kucing</color></size>

plants.name: Jamur Gurita
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>"Aku tansah seneng ngetokake asap sing abot," ujare Jamur Gurita. "Aku ngerti akeh wong sing ora seneng. Jarene ora sopan utawa ambune ora enak. Sing iso dakkandhakake yaiku, apa sampeyan luwih seneng otakmu dipangan Mayit?"</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Jamur Gurita ngobong asap gedhe ing sakupenge.

<color=black>Karusakan: </color><color=#8B0000>20*4/1.9 Detik</color></size>

plants.name: Jamur Gurita Kobong
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Kemampuan Jamur Gurita Kobong kanggo ngetokake uap panas ndadekake dheweke dadi tukang roti sing misuwur. Kue-kue Pedes khas dheweke dadi favorit ing antarane akeh, sing disenengi amarga rasa sing beda.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Ngetokaké asap bara sing ngrusak dhuwur ing sakubengé.

<color=black>Karusakan: </color><color=#8B0000>40*4/1,9 Detik</color>
<color=#720026>Debuff Kebakar: </color><color=#8B0000>Ndadekake debuff Kebakar nalika nyerang Mayit.</color>
<color=black>Formula Fusi: </color><color=#8B0000>Lombok + Jamur Gurita</color></size>

plants.name: Jamur Gurita Beku
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Ngimpi-ngimpi karir minangka fisikawan, Jamur Gurita Beku ngaturake dina-dina kanggo mbukak kerumitan donya, ngindhari kontak karo tanduran liya. "Kenapa aku duwe pirang-pirang senar es kerucut sing metu saka sirahku?" dheweke mikir, pitakonan paling anyar sing ana ing pikirane. Dheweke aneh banget babagan nelpon dheweke. "</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Ngeculke asap kadhemen ing sakubenge sing iso beku Mayit.

<color=black>Karusakan: </color><color=#8B0000>20*4/1,9 Detik (Piercing) </color>
<color=#0077b6>Sistem Beku: </color><color=#8B0000>Saben serangan nambah 5 Beku Poin.</color>
<color=black>Formula Fusi: </color><color=#8B0000>Jamur Es + Jamur Gurita</color></size>

plants.name: Kacang Neraka
plants.introduce: <size=34><color=black>Neraka Kacang minangka penggemar gedhe ing Olimpiade lan kanthi semangat ngeyel supaya Kayu Oncor dipilih minangka Oncor Olimpiade. Nanging ati-ati kanggo wong sing ora ngerti: aja nyoba mangan dheweke. . Sampeyan iso uga kobong amarga panas Pedes.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=32>Mayit bakal entek nalika digigit.

<color=black>Kateguhan: </color><color=#8B0000>8000</color>
<color=#720026>Debuff Kebakar: </color><color=#8B0000>Mayit sing Kebakar bakal 50% luwih rentan kanggo kabeh serangan.</color>
<color=black>Khusus: </color><color=#8B0000>Yen kena pengaruh Lombok, nambani 1000 Mayit sing nyerang uga ilang 20 Kesehatan saben gigitan.</color>
<color=black>Formula Fusi: </color><color=#8B0000>Lombok + Dhuwur Kacang</color></size>

plants.name: Eri Beku
plants.introduce: <size=35><color=black>Sawise bali saka Alaska, Eri Beku ora iso nahan kasenengane. Merga kepengin membekukan Mayit, dheweke ngrasakake pikirane "es" sing njeblug ing ngisor sikile. . Dheweke nggawe titik yen saben wong nggunakake istilah "es." Kulite isih nggawa hawa adhem saka petualangan Arktik, lan mripate berkilauan karo kecemerlangan sing ora leleh. salju.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=34>Iso nyusup ban lan beku Mayit.

<color=black>Kateguhan: </color><color=#8B0000>450</color>
<color=black>Karusakan: </color><color=#8B0000>20*2/1 Detik (Alon) </color>
<color=#0077b6>Sistem Beku: </color><color=#8B0000>Nambah 5 Beku Points saben serangan.</color>
<color=black>Khusus: </color><color=#8B0000>Iso nyusup ban, kendharaan sing mateni insta.</color>
<color=black>Formula Fusi: </color><color=#8B0000>Jamur Es + Eri Watu</color></size>

plants.name: Eri Jahanam
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Durung suwe iki, Eri Jahanam lelungan menyang Meksiko lan kesapu dening semangat sregep warga lokal, cepet-cepet jatuh cinta karo taco. Saiki, dheweke mbuwang kabeh energi menyang museum taco ing sandhinge Eri Beku, sanajan Eri Beku katon ora seneng karo dheweke.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Nimbulake Mayit sing ngidak lan uga nusuk kendaraan.

<color=black>Kateguhan: </color><color=#8B0000>450</color>
<color=black>Karusakan: </color><color=#8B0000>40*2/1 Detik</color>
<color=#720026>Kebakar Debuff: </color><color=#8B0000>Nerapake Debuff Kebakar nalika nyerang Mayit.</color>
<color=black>Formula Fusi: </color><color=#8B0000>Lombok + Eri Watu</color></size>

plants.name: Banyu Eri Jamur
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>"Wong-wong kerep takon babagan penampilanku, mula aku jelasake: Aku saka Gurun Namib," ujare Banyu Eri Jamur marang sapa wae sing takon. "Yen sampeyan wis ngerti babagan geografi, sampeyan bakal ngerti yen ara-ara samun iso ditemokake ing sacedhake segara!"</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Serang nir lan kapal udara sing mabur, saya suwe saya gedhe.

<color=black>Karusakan: </color><color=#8B0000>20 → 20*4 / 1,5 Detik</color>
<color=black>Wektu Wutah: </color><color=#8B0000>120 Detik</color>
<color=black>Formula Fusi: </color><color=#8B0000>Jamur Banyu + Kaktus</color></size>

plants.name: Banyu Srengenge Jamur
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>"Sedhih, aku iki  Jamur, dudu kembang, mula aku ora iso diarani kembang laut utawa sing padha," Banyu Srengenge Jamur ngakoni. "Kadhangkala, iki ndadekake aku mudhun, nanging aja nganti ngganggu sampeyan. Aku iso uga dudu kembang srengenge, nanging aku isih iso nggunakake reaksi fisik lan kimia sing beda-beda ing banyu kanggo menehi sinar srengenge!"</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Ngasilake jumlah Srengenge sing saya akeh nalika tuwuh.

<color=black>Output Srengenge: </color><color=#8B0000>15 → 25 → 50 / 15 Detik</color>
<color=black>Wektu Tuwuh: </color><color=#8B0000>20 Detik → 40 Detik</color>
<color=black>Formula Fusi: </color><color=#8B0000>Jamur Banyu + Kembang Srengenge</color></size>

plants.name: Lentera Laut
plants.introduce: <size=31><color=black>"Aku wis dadi sistem entheng ing pesta blumbang bajak laut, kerja ing perusahaan penyelamat banyu jero Amazon sajrone telung sasi, lan malah dadi umpan mancing wengi. nalika aku lagi turu!" Banyu Lamp Jamur nuduhake, campuran nesu lan bangga katon ing swarane. "Saiki, aku golek pegaweyan mantep. Pakdhe Dave nyebutake yen blumbang ing latar mburi mbutuhake Lentera, nanging dheweke lali yen dheweke kebak Mayit!"</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=31>Ngilangake pedhut lan menehi cahya, dadi gedhe sawise sawetara wektu.

<color=black>Wektu Wutah: </color><color=#8B0000>60 Detik</color>
<color=#99582a>Sistem Cahya: </color><color=#8B0000>Menehi 1 Level Cahya ing Grid 3x3, 5x5 sawise wutah.</color>
<color=black>Formula Fusi: </color><color=#8B0000>Jamur Banyu + Lentera</color></size>

plants.name: Kaktusneon
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>"Petualanganku ing ara-ara samun wis nggawe aku apik banget,"Kaktusneon gumunggung, nanging dheweke ora lali ngisi lenga Lenterane saben dina kanggo mesthekake dheweke terus sumunar. .</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Kebakaran Eri lan laser, gumantung saka tingkat Cahya.

<color=black>Karusakan: </color><color=#8B0000>20/1,5 Detik, 20* 2/1,5 Detik (Udara)</color>
<color=#99582a>Sistem Cahya: </color><color=#8B0000>Entuk buff ing ngisor iki gumantung saka Level Cahya:
Level 1 =Pierce 3 Times
Level 2 =Infinite Pierce
Level 3 =Laser Banyu Rusak → 60</color>
<color=black>Formula Fusi: </color><color=#8B0000>Lentera + Kaktus</color></size>

plants.name: Kipas Padhang
plants.introduce: <size=34><color=black>"Lilin perak madhangi kanvas musim gugur sing adhem, dene kipas sutra sing entheng njoged anggun karo kunang-kunang." Iki puisi sing ditresnani Glowver. ing kanak-kanak, lan asring seneng angin kelangan ing banyu ing wayah wengi, admiring carane fluoresensi munggah alon-alon saka angin, kelip-kelip sadurunge alon-alon bali menyang suket sing peteng, mung Mayit sing ora iso ndeleng kaendahan sing apik banget.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=34>Ngilangake kabut lan nambah level Cahya ing tanduran Cahya.

<color=#99582a>Sistem Cahya: </color><color=#8B0000>Menehi 1 Tingkat Cahya kanggo Tanduran Cahya ing kabeh lapangan suwene 30 detik.</color>
<color=black>Formula Fusi: </color><color=#8B0000>Lentera + Kipas</color></size>

plants.name: Blimbingglow
plants.introduce: <size=30><color=black>Lintang-lintang nari ing banyu nalika lampu-lampu mancing nyiapake munggah ing langit. Ombak-ombak mboyong rembulan nalika ombak ngasilake lintang-lintang. Nalika isih cilik, Blimbingglow ngimpi. saka njupuk lintang, asring gazing ing shimmer ing banyu Meeting Lentera mulang dheweke sing siji ora perlu meri lintang sarwa ndhuwur, malah cahya faintest, kaya kunang-kunang anget lan kaendahan.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=30>Motret lintang sing iso nglacak Mayit yen ana cahya.

<color=black>Karusakan: </color><color=#8B0000>40*5/3 Detik</color>
<color=#99582a>Sistem Cahya: </color><color=#8B0000>Njaluk buff ing ngisor iki:
Level 1 =Lintang saiki iso nglacak nir ing baris sing padha.
Level 2 =Lintang dibubarake terus-terusan, ora preduli manawa ana Mayit.
Level 3 =Lintang nglacak Mayit ing endi wae.</color>
<color=black>Formula Fusi: </color><color=#8B0000>Lentera + Blimbing</color></size>

plants.name: Bal Eri
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Bal Eri tansah obah-obah ing kelompok, ngoceh kanthi sombong lan ngremehake wong liya. Tetuwuhan liyane kepengin weruh apa sing iso ditindakake makhluk cilik kasebut, nanging Bal Eri tetep ora kaget: " Yen kupu-kupu iso nggawe prahara, mesthi kita bakal luwih kuat."</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Muntah eri kanggo nyerang Mayit ing langit. Ora ngenggoni kothak apa wae.

<color=black>Karusakan: </color><color=#8B0000>20*2 / 1,5 detik (Tanduran), 20*2 / 1 Detik (Wingman)</color>
<color=black>Khusus: </color><color=#8B0000>Iso ditandur ing ndhuwur tanduran liya.</color>
<color=black>Formula Fusi: </color><color=#8B0000>Kaktus + Kipas</color></size>

plants.name: Wuluh Apung
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>"Sanajan jenengku mirip karo kewan, nanging jeneng panggunge mung jeneng panggung," jlentrehe Banyu Blimbing. "Aku iki tukang sulap sing iso ngusir spora macem-macem wujud." Dheweke ora seneng banget karo Mayit nyilem, kuwatir yen dheweke bakal nemokake bebener: dheweke mung Jamur segara kanthi pistol banyu bentuke lintang sing ana ing dheweke. sirah.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Serangan kaping pindho nalika wis diwasa.

<color=black>Karusakan: </color><color=#8B0000>20*5 → 20*5*2 / 1,5 Detik</color>
<color=black>Wektu Wutah: </color><color=#8B0000>60 Detik</color>
<color=black>Formula Fusi: </color><color=#8B0000>Jamur Banyu + Blimbing</color></size>

plants.name: Blimbing Kipas
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>"Klumpukake lintang-lintang ing sakubengku lan wenehake marang wong-wong sing pengin lintang montor mabur," Blimbing Kipas mratelakake kanthi bangga, percaya yen iki minangka misi mulia. Nanging, ora kabeh wong ngajeni—utamane nalika udan lintang teka Langsung mabur.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Narik lintang kanggo muter ngubengi dhewe lan diluncurake.

<color=black>Khusus: </color><color=#8B0000>Narik proyektil lintang sing cedhak. Sawise 6 detik , nembak metu minangka proyektil pelacak kanthi kacepetan lan karusakan kaping pindho. </color><color=#8B0000>Kipas + Blimbing</color></size>

plants.name: Blimbing Eri
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Blimbing Eri mesthi rada aneh. Tandurane guyon, "Dheweke mesthi ana ing lemah nanging mung nglawan Mayit sing mabur. Yagene dheweke ora ngetutake lemah?" Blimbing Eri, sabar, ora ngomong apa-apa, kanthi tenang nglindhungi rahasiane: visi sing ora apik mung ngidini dheweke ndeleng langit nalika dheweke turu.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Mung iso nyerang Mayit ing langit.

<color=black>Karusakan: </color><color=#8B0000>20*5/1,5 Detik</color>
<color=black>Khusus: </color><color=#8B0000>Lintang Eri nglacak nir mabur ing papan.</color>
<color=black>Formula Fusi: </color><color=#8B0000>Kaktus + Blimbing</color></size>

plants.name: Jamur Kipas Banyu
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Jamur Kipas Banyu nduweni cita-cita sing gedhene kaya naga. Nguwasani seni kuno "Feng Shui" saka Timur, dheweke ngerti banget babagan begja lan posisi apes. Ngerti yen angin lan banyu nglengkapi siji liyane, dheweke ngarep-arep supaya kacilakan ing teluk, apa munggah ing langit utawa ngleyang liwat banyu.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Ngusir pedhut lan ngusir nir ing banyu.

<color=black>Khusus: </color><color=#8B0000>Ngusir kabut lan ngusir nir banyu.</color>
<color=black>Formula Fusi: </color><color=#8B0000>Jamur Banyu + Kipas</color></size>

plants.name: Waluh Lentera
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Waluh Lentera negesake manawa dheweke kerep nemoni memedi, nanging apa dheweke pancen ana? wong sing kepengin banget wedi.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Ing area cilik, ngilangi kabut lan nambah Level Cahya kanggo tanduran Cahya ing njero.

<color=black>Keteguhan: </color><color=#8B0000>4000 </color>
<color=#99582a>Sistem Cahya: </color><color=#8B0000>Menehi 1 Level Cahya ing Grid 3x3. Mulihake 150 Ketangguhan saben Level Cahya saben 15 detik.</color>
<color=black>Formula Fusi: </color><color=#8B0000>Lentera + Waluh</color></size>

plants.name: Eri Waluh
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Eri Waluh iso uga katon kaya sedulur adoh saka Waluh, nanging wujude saiki asale saka petualangan ara-ara samun karo Kipas. Anehe, katon ora ana Eri sing katon, nanging tanduran sing nyoba mlumpat ing njerone tansah dEsmplungake, nggawe dheweke takon kepiye kedadeyane.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Melawan Mayit sing nggigit.

<color=black>Kateguhan: </color><color=#8B0000>4000</color>
<color=black>Khusus: </color><color=#8B0000>Ngrusak mungsuh sing nyerang.</color>
<color=black>Formula Fusi: </color><color=#8B0000>Kaktus + Waluh</color></size>

plants.name: Blimbing Waluh
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Wong-wong kerep mikir pira basa sing kudu dingerteni Blimbing Waluh supaya iso komunikasi kanthi gampang karo kabeh tanduran. mung siji sing aku kerja bareng."</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Mbantu Blimbing Kipas nahan lintang liyane.

<color=black>Kateguhan: </color><color=#8B0000>4000</color>
<color=black>Khusus : </color><color=#8B0000>Nambah watesan panyimpenan Blimbing Kipas dadi 60.</color>
<color=black>Formula Fusi: </color><color=#8B0000>Biji Blimbing + Waluh</color></size>

plants.name: Kiplipli Pisah
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Sadulur Kembar Kipli tansah mbantah arah sing paling apik kanggo murub - maju utawa mundur. Nanging saiki wis nemokake solusi sing cerdas: ayo Kipli mbalek maneh. Masalah wis rampung. !</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Kipli pamisah nembak Kipli maju mundur.

<color=black>Karusakan: </color><color=#8B0000>20*3/1,5 Detik</color>
<color=black>Khusus: </color><color=#8B0000>Kiplis dijupuk mundur bakal mumbul lan maju.</color>
<color=black>Formula Fusi: </color><color=#8B0000>Kiplipli + Kipli</color></size>

plants.name: Waluh Kipas
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Kanggo Waluh Kipas, katon apik minangka prioritas utama. Dheweke ora nate metu saka omah tanpa ngentekake setengah jam dhisik kanggo nyempurnakake godhong ing sirahe, supaya gayane ora cacat.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Kadhang-kadhang Kipas bakal ngetokake pedhut.

<color=black>Kateguhan: </color><color=#8B0000>4000</color>
<color=black>Khusus: </color><color=#8B0000>Ngasilake Kipas saben 30 detik.</color>
<color=black>Formula Fusi: </color><color=#8B0000>Kipas + Waluh</color></size>

plants.name: Waluh Magnet
plants.introduce: <size=32><color=black>Makanan metu nggawe gemeter ing utomo Waluh Magnet. Dheweke mesthi wedi yen peralatan makan wesi bakal nempel ing rai, ngowahi dhaharan sing nyenengake dadi pengalaman sing kikuk.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=32>Iso nggabung karo bahan wesi saka Mayit kanggo nyerep sifate.

<color=black>Kateguhan: </color><color=#8B0000>4000</color>
<color=black>Sistem Magnet: </color><color=#8B0000>Tanduran iki bakal menehi hasil:
(20 * Jumlah Tanduran Magnetik ing Sistem * Kacepetan Mayit) kanggo Mayit tartamtu saben 6 Detik. Mung Mayit karo bahan magnet UTAWA kendaraan mekanik sing iso rusak kanthi cara iki, uga ora ana ing langit utawa ing lemah.</color>
<color=black>Formula Fusi: </color><color=#8B0000>Waluh + Jamur Magnet</color></size>

plants.name: Blimbing Magnet
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Blimbing Magnet duwe impen selawase: nyedhot lintang-lintang saka langit. Saben wengi dheweke nginep ing tawang ono lintang, mbayangno dina nalika impene dadi kenyataan.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Iso gabung karo bahan wesi saka Mayit kanggo nyerep sifate.

<color=black>Karusakan: </color><color=#8B0000>20*5/1.5 Detik</color>
<color=black>Khusus: </color><color=#8B0000>Ndadekake karusakan kaping pindho kanggo Mayit wesi.</color>
<color=black>Formula Fusi: </color><color=#8B0000>Blimbing + Jamur Magnet</color></size>

plants.name: Blimbingbadut
plants.introduce: <size=34><color=black>Blimbingbadut asring nanggung beban amarga katon minangka badut sirkus, sing ndadekake dheweke ora seneng. "Aku iso uga katon lucu, nanging nyatane, aku dadi pahlawan super. ," ujare. "Aku mrentahake Jack-in-the-Box Mayit lan nganggo setelan pahlawan ing njero!" Mbok menawa Jamur Magnet sing nulungi dheweke ing heist ora nate nyebutake saka ngendi kothak kasebut.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=34>Mosok lintang sing njeblug nalika kontak.

<color=black>Karusakan: </color><color=#8B0000>40*5/3 Detik</color>
<color=black>Khusus: </color><color=#8B0000>Lintang njeblug kanggo ngatasi karusakan cipratan cilik nalika kontak.</color>
<color=black>Formula Fusi: </color><color=#8B0000>(Blimbing + Jamur Magnet) + Jack-in-the-Box (In Order)</color></size>

plants.name: Blimbinggali
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>"Iku pancen kaya palu," komentar Blimbinggali, kanthi nada sing nyenengake. "Aku iso ngrasakake awakku ana ing lemah, lan cukup nyenengake — kajaba sampeyan diganggu serangga kaya lipan." Karo mesem nakal, dheweke nantang, "Kok aku ora copot topi? Sampeyan bakal nemokake yen aku luwih mirip palu tinimbang sampeyan!"</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Blimbinggali ndhelik ing njero lemah: nir ora bakal nyerang.

<color=black>Karusakan: </color><color=#8B0000>20*5/1,5 Detik</color>
<color=black>Khusus: </color><color=#8B0000>Ora iso diserang.</color>
<color=black>Formula Fusi: </color><color=#8B0000>(Blimbing + Jamur Magnet) + Beliung (Miturut)</color></size>

plants.name: Blimbingwesi
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Wong-wong kerep nggunakake headshots Blimbingwesi lan Blimbing Magnet kanggo ngunggahake hubungane, sing dadi masalah banget saka loro-lorone. Nyatane, Blimbingwesi mung pengin dadi awake dhewe - bintang karo jantung watu sing angel teyeng.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Lintang geni sing dilapisi karo lapisan metalik.

<color=black>Kateguhan: </color><color=#8B0000>2000</color>
<color=black>Karusakan: </color><color=#8B0000>40*5/1,5 Detik</color>
<color=black>Khusus: </color><color=#8B0000>Ndadekake karusakan gedhe kanggo Iron Mayit, lan ngrusak lawang wesi.</color>
<color=black>Formula Fusi: </color><color=#8B0000>(Blimbing + Jamur Magnet) + Ember (In Order)</color></size>

plants.name: Waluh Baja
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>"Muga-muga aku luwih kuwat," Wesi Waluh muses. "Mungkin yen aku digawe saka Inten..." Blimbingwesi mesem lan mangsuli, " Malah ora bakal cukup! Sampeyan kudu netherite!" Ing olok-olok semangat, dheweke lali kaSrengengeyatan sing penting: dheweke iso nggumunake kekuwatane dhewe.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Ngreksa tanduran sampeyan nganggo wesi sing kuat.

<color=black>Kateguhan: </color><color=#8B0000>8000</color>
<color=black>Formula Fusi: </color><color=#8B0000>(Waluh + Jamur Magnet) + Emberet</color></size>

plants.name: Waluh Badut
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>"Saben aku metu, iku tandha tekane badut. Saben uwong kepengin weruh apa sing ana ing kothak kasebut, nanging asile tetep dadi misteri. Aku kepethuk sepisan, lan wayahe ngganti kabeh kanggo kula."</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Iso ngalangi bledosan sing disebabake dening Mayit Jack-in-the-Box

<color=black>Kateguhan: </color><color=#8B0000>4000</color>
<color=black>Khusus: </color><color=#8B0000>Batal karusakan bledosan saka Jack-in-the-Box, nglindhungi tanduran ing njero.</color>
<color=black>Formula Fusi: </color><color=#8B0000>(Waluh + Jamur Magnet) + Jack-in-the-Box</color></size>

plants.name: Waluh Penambang
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Waluh asring digunakake kanggo nglindhungi tanduran ing mburi supaya ora diserang dening para penambang. Amarga kepengin ngendhegake para penambang ngebor menyang lemah, dheweke njupuk palu lan sinau. Pungkasane, dheweke ngembangake teknologi anyar sing meksa para penambang supaya iso metu saka lemah luwih dhisik.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Iso ngalangi upaya perRanjauan dening Digger Mayit.

<color=black>Kateguhan: </color><color=#8B0000>4000</color>
<color=black>Khusus: </color><color=#8B0000>Meksa Mayit Penggali gali prematur.</color>
<color=black>Formula Fusi: </color><color=#8B0000>(Waluh + Jamur Magnet) + Palu</color></size>

plants.name: Maglen Jamur
plants.introduce: <size=31><color=black>"Jujur, aku pengin dadi Jamur Magnet sing prasaja," Maglen Jamur ngaku. "Mangkono, aku ora kudu mlebu. sorotan terus-terusan utawa ngrasakake tekanan nggunakake magnet siji kanggo nindakake karya loro."</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=31>Rentang atraksi lan wektu Isi Daya mundhak gumantung saka Level Cahya.

<color=black>Jarak Wektu Magnet: </color><color=#8B0000>15 Detik (LL0) → 11 Detik → 7,5 Detik → 5 Detik (LL3)</color>
<color=black>Rentang Magnet: </color><color=#8B0000>+1 (LL1) → +2 → +3</color>
<color=#99582a>Sistem Cahya: </color><color=#8B0000>Tingkat Cahya sing luwih dhuwur bakal Ngartekno shorten Jarak Wektu atraksi lan nambah sawetara atraksi Nalika iku Cahya Level 2, atraksi bakal nimbulaké 200 karusakan kanggo nir cedhak atraksi target.</color>
<color=black>Formula Fusi: </color><color=#8B0000>Lentera + Jamur Magnet</color></size>

plants.name: Banyu Jamur Magnet
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Kerang laut liyane ora ngerti sebabe Banyu Jamur Magnet iso nyerep wesi dadi luwih gedhe lan luwih dhuwur. diterangake, sanajan akeh energi ilang ing udhara lan ora iso digunakake.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Aneh tenan... Kenging punapa sembrani saya tambah gedhe nalika tuwuh?

<color=black>Selang Magnet: </color><color=#8B0000>15 Detik → 10 Detik</color>
<color=black>Khusus: </color><color=#8B0000>Tuwuh sawise narik 3 kaping.</color>
<color=black>Formula Fusi: </color><color=#8B0000>Jamur Banyu + Jamur Magnet</color></size>

plants.name: Magnet Kipas
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Tanduran asring nyebat Magnet Kipas "Magneto." Dhèwèké kanthi yakin ngucapaké mantra sing paling disenengi, "Disarmament!" marang para Mayit, senajan ora ngerti carané. konversi energi angin dadi energi magnetik dianggo ing mburi layar.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Nyedhot kabeh barang wesi sing ana.

<color=black>Khusus: </color><color=#8B0000>Narik nganti 10 obyek wesi.</color>
<color=black>Formula Fusi: </color><color=#8B0000>Kipas + Jamur Magnet</color></size>

plants.name: Magnet Eri
plants.introduce: <size=32><color=black>Magnet Eri ngginakaken sawetara wektu sinau komunikasi macet ing Akademi Angkatan Udara, asring ngegung-egungake kanca-kancane babagan biji lintange. Sing ora disadari yaiku suksese akeh-akehe. matur nuwun marang bapake, komandan Angkatan Udara dhuwur sing narik tali ing mburi layar.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=32>Iso nyebabake karusakan dhuwur kanggo obyek sing mabur.

<color=black>Karusakan: </color><color=#8B0000>20/1,5 Detik</color>
<color=black>Khusus: </color><color=#8B0000>Deals pindho karusakan kanggo waja meDhuwuric Dealing jumlah tartamtu saka karusakan kanggo Banyuships iso nimbulaké kacilakan, nggawe menehi 1000 karusakan kanggo Mayit ing cedhak situs kacilakan.</color>
<color=black>Formula Fusi: </color><color=#8B0000>Kaktus + Jamur Magnet</color></size>
plants.cost: <size=36><color=#6A0C9D>Kahanan Panggunaan: Mode Pertahanan Menara Peta Gedhe</color></size>

plants.name: Lintang Jatuh
plants.introduce: <size=30><color=black></color></size>
plants.info:
<size=28>Nyeluk meteor sing nyebabake karusakan gedhe.

<color=black>Karusakan: </color><color=#8B0000>60*5/3 Detik</color>
<color=#99582a>Sistem Cahya: </color><color=#8B0000>Tingkat Cahya 1 nganti 3 nduweni efek sing padha karo Blimbingglow nalika tekan Cahya Level 4, nimbali jinis meteor liyane sing duwe Isi Daya kapisah saka meteor asli.</color>
<color=#495057>Sistem Magnetik: </color><color=#8B0000>Saben tanduran sing disambungake menyang Sistem Magnetik bakal nambah karusakan lintang nganti 5%.
<color=#6A0C9D>Loro sistem iso nambah karusakan saka lintang nganti 120, maksimum.
<color=black>Khusus: </color><color=#8B0000>Nyeluk meteor sing kenek lemah lan njeblug dadi lintang saben 60 detik Isi Daya iso suda kanthi nyambungake Lintang Jatuh liyane bebarengan, nganti 13 kanggo Isi Daya sing luwih apik 25 detik.</color>
<color=black>Formula Fusi: </color><color=#8B0000>Lentera + Jamur Magnet + Blimbing</color>
<color=black>Kelana Exclusive Buff: </color><color=#8B0000>Kabeh Isi Daya serangan Meteor dikurangi setengah | Kipatron Sub-spesies Ora Dikunci</color></size>

plants.name: Kiplipli Es
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>"Apa sing kedaden karo sampeyan?" sawijining tanduran sing penasaran takon Kiplipli Es. Dheweke ngguyu lirih lan kandha, "Aku isih dadi Kiplipli. Aku mung lali nglebokke kemul ing wayah bengi musim dingin."</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Nembak loro Kipli beku berturut-turut.

<color=black>Karusakan: </color><color=#8B0000>20*2/1,5 Detik</color>
<color=black>Formula Fusi: </color><color=#8B0000>Kiplipli + Jamur Es</color></size>

plants.name: Salju Brondong
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>"Tangane adem, raine adem, atine adem, malah getihe adem... Apa dheweke beku?" ana sing takon banter. Brondong Salju nggegirisi, nglilani tanduran sing prihatin, "Aku ora beku! Laras senapan mesinku isih kobong!"</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Brondong Snow njupuk papat Kipli beku sekaligus.

<color=black>Karusakan: </color><color=#8B0000>20*4/1,5 Detik</color>
<color=black>Formula Fusi: </color><color=#8B0000>Brondong Kipli + Jamur Es</color></size>

plants.name: Kiplipli Es Pisah
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>"Aja nganti fasad es nyasarké kowé; iso uga ana anget sing didhelikake," ana wong sing nyaranake. Nanging Digger Mayit ngece, "Aja nggawe asumsi bodho. Wong iki ora duwe apa-apa kajaba sisi dingin!"</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Nembak Kipli beku maju mundur.

<color=black>Karusakan: </color><color=#8B0000>20*3/1,5 Detik</color>
<color=black>Formula Fusi: </color><color=#8B0000>Kembar Kipli + Jamur Es</color></size>

plants.name: Kiplipli Pisah Ceri
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Kipli Ceri nyusup metu saka parit, bingung. "Sapa sing mbuwang bom kuwi?" panjaluke. "Nuwun sewu, Dhik," wangsulane Kembar Ceri gugup, "Aku weruh sampeyan ngarahake bedhil menyang kita lan ngira yen sampeyan Mayit."</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Kiplipli Pisah Ceri shoot maju mundur.

<color=black>Karusakan: </color><color=#8B0000>60*3/1,5 Detik</color>
<color=black>Formula Fusi: </color><color=#8B0000>Kembar Kipli + Ceri Bomb</color></size>

plants.name: Snipli
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Kagum amarga visi sing cetha lan kekuwatane sing kuat, Snipli ditresnani dening kanca-kancane Kipli. Nanging, sajrone pawai formasi, laras bedhil dheweke asring mlebu ing mburi. sirahe, nggawe sawetara wektu tegang ing dalan.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=36>Snipe Mayit ing saindhenging peta kanggo ngatasi karusakan gedhe.

<color=#4A2900>Kondisi Penggunaan: Mode Kelana</color>
<color=black>Karusakan: </color><color=#8B0000>500/3 Detik</color>
<color=black>Khusus: </color><color=#8B0000>Headshot sapisan saben 6 serangan, mateni Mayit kanthi cepet.</color></size>

plants.name: Kipas Waluh Eri
plants.introduce: <size=32><color=black>Kipas Waluh Eri tansah nyimpen telung buku ing rak, judhule didhelikake saka mripate tanduran liya sing penasaran. iku nemokake judhul: "Panduan Budidaya Tanduran Sukulen,"Perawatan Waluh Pasca Bersalin," lan "Tutorial Penerbangan Cepet Kaktus 30." Bal Eri ngguyu karo koleksi sing ora dikarepke.</color></size>
plants.info:
<size=32>Mlebokake Bal Eri sing ngubengi lapangan kanggo nyerang Mayit mabur.

<color=black>Kateguhan: </color><color=#8B0000>4000</color>
<color=black>Khusus: </color><color=#8B0000>Tansah duwe wingman Bal Eri karo dheweke nalika dheweke katon ing ndhuwur kothak 3x3 kanthi rutin.</color>
<color=black>Formula Fusi: </color><color=#8B0000>Waluh + Kaktus + Kipas</color></size>

plants.name: Srengenge Plinthengan
plants.introduce: <size=36><color=black>Ana wong sing takon kenapa Srengenges cilik Srengenge Plinthengan ilang nalika dibuwang ing sisih tengen gendheng. Srengenge Plinthengan mung mesem: "Menurutmu, Srengenge ngarep teka ing ngendi. saka?"</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Mbukak Kol surya kanggo nyerang Mayit lan uga iso ngasilake Srengenge.

<color=black>Karusakan: </color><color=#8B0000>50/5 Detik</color>
<color=black>Khusus: </color><color=#8B0000>Ngasilake 100 Srengenge nalika gabungan 200 Srengéngé, iso mumbul sepisan manèh; nalika nempuh Mayit utawa lemah, tiba 5 Srengéngé.</color>
<color=black>Formula Fusi: </color><color=#8B0000>Kol- pult + Kembang Srengenge</color>

plants.name: Pot Kol
